item.title: KR
item.description: score:91 Chances: Kroger’s estimated fair value is US$75.19 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity Kroger’s US$46.14. The Kroger Co. is partnering with Home Chef and Ambitious Kitchen to offer exclusive meal kits, showing innovation and potential for growth in the meal solutions market.
